Class CcddWebDataAccessHandler

    public class CcddWebDataAccessHandler
extends org.eclipse.jetty.server.handler.AbstractHandler
    CFS Command & Data Dictionary web data access handler class

      • getParts

        private java.lang.String[] getParts(java.lang.String text,
                          java.lang.String separator,
                          int limit,
                          boolean removeQuotes)
        Extract the parts from the supplied text string, separating the string at the specified separation character(s) and removing any leading and trailing white space characters from each part
        Parameters:
        text - text string to separate
        separator - separation character(s). This is padded with a check for white space characters in order to remove them
        limit - maximum number of parts to separate the text into. This is the number of parts returned, with any missing parts returned as blanks
        removeQuotes - true to remove excess double quotes from the individual array members
        Returns:
        Array containing the specified number of parts of the text string. A part is returned as blank if the supplied text does not contain the number of parts specified by the limit

      • getVariablePathSeparators

        private java.lang.String[] getVariablePathSeparators(java.lang.String parameters)
                                              throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the separator characters used to convert an application variable path to a user-defined variable path
        Parameters:
        parameters - comma-separated string containing the variable path separator character(s), show/hide data types flag ('true' or 'false'), and data type/variable name separator character(s)
        Returns:
        String array containing the variable path separator character(s), show/hide data types flag ('true' or 'false'), and data type/variable name separator character(s); the default separators if the input parameters string is blank. An exception is thrown if the parameter string format is invalid
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an invalid character is detected in the separator field(s)

      • getQueryResults

        private java.lang.String getQueryResults(java.lang.String component,
                               java.lang.String item)
        Process the web query and return the results encoded as a JSON string. The query is in the form [server]:[port]/[component]?[attribute][=name]
        Parameters:
        component - component for which to request data
        item - item in the component
        Returns:
        Query results encoded as a JSON string

      • authenticateUser

        private java.lang.String authenticateUser(java.lang.String userName,
                                java.lang.String password)
        Authenticate the specified user credentials
        Parameters:
        userName - user name
        password - user password
        Returns:
        The string "true" if the user name and password are valid for the currently open database; otherwise returns "false"

      • getSearchResults

        private java.lang.String getSearchResults(java.lang.String searchCriteria)
        Perform a search for the specified text in the data and internal tables
        Parameters:
        searchCriteria - attribute containing the search constraints in the format ,,,<,search table column names>. The 'ignore case' and 'data table cells only' flags default to false if not provided. The last criterion is optional and allows the search to be constrained to specific columns in the data tables. The column names must be comma-separated (if more than one) and are case sensitive
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the search results. An empty string if no matches are found, and null if the search parameters are missing or invalid

      • getProjectInformation

        private java.lang.String getProjectInformation()
        Get the active project's information (name, description, lock status, and user)
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing active project's information

      • getTableList

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTableList()
        Get a list containing the names and paths of every data table. The tree type (prototype only or instances only) is determined by the server command
        Returns:
        List containing the names and paths of every data table

      • getTableData

        private java.lang.String getTableData(java.lang.String tableName,
                            boolean getDescription,
                            java.lang.String[] separators)
                               throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the data for the specified data table, or for all data tables if no table name is provided
        Parameters:
        tableName - table name and path in the format rootTable[,dataType1.variable1[,...]]. Blank to return the data for all tables
        getDescription - true to get the table description when loading the table data
        separators - string array containing the variable path separator character(s), show/hide data types flag ('true' or 'false'), and data type/variable name separator character(s)
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the specified table cell data; null if a table name is specified and the table doesn't exist or if no data tables exist in the project database, or blank if the specified table has no data or none of the tables have data. Empty cells are included
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs while parsing the table data

      • getTableDescription

        private java.lang.String getTableDescription(java.lang.String tableName)
        Get the description for the specified table, or all tables with a description if no table name is provided
        Parameters:
        tableName - table name and path in the format rootTable[,dataType1.variable1[,...]]. If blank then the description for every data table with a description is returned
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the specified table's description; null if the specified table doesn't exist or the project has no data tables

      • getTableFields

        private java.lang.String getTableFields(java.lang.String tableName,
                              boolean checkExists)
                                 throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the data field information for the specified table, or for all tables if no table name is provided
        Parameters:
        tableName - table name and path in the format rootTable[,dataType1.variable1[,...]]. If blank then every data table's data fields are returned
        checkExists - true to check if the specified table exists in the project database
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the specified table's data fields; null if the table doesn't exist or if the project database contains no data tables
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs while parsing the table data field data

      • getTableNames

        private java.lang.String getTableNames(java.lang.String tableType)
        Get the names of all tables of the specified table type, or all tables names and their types if no table type is provided
        Parameters:
        tableType - table type. The type is case insensitive. If blank then every data table and its type is returned
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing all table names of the specified table type; blank if the type is valid but no tables of the type exist, and null if the specified table type doesn't exist or if no data tables exist in the project database

      • getStructureSize

        private java.lang.String getStructureSize(java.lang.String tableName)
        Get the number of bytes for the prototype of the specified structure table, or for all prototype structure tables if no table is specified
        Parameters:
        tableName - structure table name or path
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the structure table name(s) and corresponding size(s) in bytes; null if a table name is specified and the table doesn't exist or isn't a structure, or if no structure tables exist in the project database

      • getTableInformation

        private java.lang.String getTableInformation(java.lang.String tableName,
                                   java.lang.String[] separators)
                                      throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the type, description, size, data, and data fields for the specified data table
        Parameters:
        tableName - table name and path in the format rootTable[,dataType1.variable1[,...]]. Blank to return the data for all tables
        separators - string array containing the variable path separator character(s), show/hide data types flag ('true' or 'false'), and data type/variable name separator character(s)
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the specified table information; null if a table name is specified and the table doesn't exist or if no data tables exist in the project database
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs while parsing the table information

      • getGroupTables

        private java.lang.String getGroupTables(java.lang.String groupName,
                              boolean applicationOnly,
                              boolean includeNameTag,
                              CcddGroupHandler groupHandler)
                                 throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the tables associated with the specified group or application, or for all groups/applications if no group name is provided
        Parameters:
        groupName - group name. If blank then every group's (application's) descriptions are returned
        applicationOnly - true if only groups that represent applications should be processed
        includeNameTag - true to include the group name item
        groupHandler - group handler
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the specified group's (application's) table members; null if the specified group/application doesn't exist or the project has no groups/applications, or blank if the specified group/application has no table member or if all groups/applications are requested but none have a table member
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs while parsing the group tables

      • getGroupDescription

        private java.lang.String getGroupDescription(java.lang.String groupName,
                                   boolean applicationOnly,
                                   boolean includeNameTag,
                                   CcddGroupHandler groupHandler)
                                      throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the description for the specified group or application, or all groups/applications with a description if no group name is provided
        Parameters:
        groupName - group name. If blank then every group's (application's) descriptions are returned
        applicationOnly - true if only groups that represent applications should be processed
        groupHandler - group handler
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the specified group's (application's) description; null if the specified group/application doesn't exist or the project has no groups/applications, or blank if the specified group/application has no description or if all groups/applications are requested but none have a description
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs while parsing the group description

      • getGroupFields

        private java.lang.String getGroupFields(java.lang.String groupName,
                              boolean applicationOnly,
                              boolean includeNameTag,
                              CcddGroupHandler groupHandler)
                                 throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the data field information for the specified group or application, or for all groups/applications if no group name is provided
        Parameters:
        groupName - group name. If blank then every data table's data fields are returned
        applicationOnly - true if only groups that represent applications should be processed
        includeNameTag - true to include the group name item and data field tag
        groupHandler - group handler
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the specified group's data fields; null if the group doesn't exist or if the project database contains no groups, or blank if the group contains no data fields
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs while parsing the group data fields

      • getGroupNames

        private java.lang.String getGroupNames(boolean applicationOnly,
                             CcddGroupHandler groupHandler)
        Get the names of all groups or applications
        Parameters:
        applicationOnly - true if only groups that represent applications should be processed
        groupHandler - group handler
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the all group/application names; null if no groups/applications exist in the project database

      • getGroupInformation

        private java.lang.String getGroupInformation(java.lang.String groupName,
                                   boolean applicationOnly,
                                   CcddGroupHandler groupHandler)
                                      throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the description, associated table(s), and data fields for the specified group or application
        Parameters:
        groupName - group name. If blank then every data table's data fields are returned
        applicationOnly - true if only groups that represent applications should be processed
        groupHandler - group handler
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the specified group/application information; null if a group name is specified and the group/application doesn't exist or if no groups/applications exist in the project database
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs while parsing the group information

      • getTelemetrySchedulerData

        private java.lang.String getTelemetrySchedulerData(java.lang.String parameters)
                                            throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the telemetry scheduler's copy table entries
        Parameters:
        parameters - comma-separated string containing the data stream name, header size (in bytes), message ID name data field name, and the optimize result flag ('true' or 'false')
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the specified copy table entries; null if the number of parameters or their formats are incorrect
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs while parsing the telemetry scheduler data

      • getApplicationSchedulerData

        private java.lang.String getApplicationSchedulerData()
        Get the application scheduler's schedule table entries
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the scheduler entries; null if the number of parameters or their formats are incorrect

      • getVariableNames

        private java.lang.String getVariableNames(java.lang.String variablePath,
                                java.lang.String parameters)
                                   throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the variable names, both in application format and altered based on the user-provided parameters
        Parameters:
        variablePath - variable path + name for which to return the converted path; blank to provide the paths for all variables
        parameters - comma-separated string containing the variable path separator character(s), show/hide data types flag ('true' or 'false'), and data type/variable name separator character(s); blank to use the default separators
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the variable names; blank if the project doesn't contain any variables and null if any input parameter is invalid
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an illegal separator character(s) or invalid show/hide data type flag value is detected

      • getTelemetryInformation

        private java.lang.String getTelemetryInformation(java.lang.String telemetryFilter)
                                          throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the path, data type, bit length, description, units, data stream information, and enumeration information for each telemetered variable matching the specified filters
        Parameters:
        telemetryFilter - group (or application) name, data stream name, and/or rate value filter(s). A table must belong to the specified group in order for its telemetered variables to be returned; blank to get all telemetered variables (regardless of group). A variable must have a rate assigned for the specified data stream in order to be included; blank to include all data streams. A variable's rate must match the specified rate in order to be included; blank to include the variable regardless of the rate value
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the path, data type, bit length, description, units, data stream name(s), and enumeration(s) for each telemetered variable matching the specified filters; empty array if no variables are telemetered
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an invalid group name, data stream name, or rate value format is detected

      • getCommandInformation

        private java.lang.String getCommandInformation(java.lang.String groupFilter)
                                        throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the information for each command matching the specified filters
        Parameters:
        groupFilter - group (or application) name. A table must belong to the specified group in order for its telemetered variables to be returned; blank to get all telemetered variables (regardless of group)
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing information for each command matching the specified filters
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If the supplied group name is unrecognized

      • getTableTypeDefinitions

        private java.lang.String getTableTypeDefinitions()
        Get the table type definitions
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the table type definitions; an empty object if no table type definition exists

      • getDataTypeDefinitions

        private java.lang.String getDataTypeDefinitions()
        Get the data type definitions
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the data type definitions; an empty object if no data type definition exists

      • getInputTypeDefinitions

        private java.lang.String getInputTypeDefinitions()
        Get the input type definitions
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the input type definitions; an empty object if no input type definition exists

      • getMacroDefinitions

        private java.lang.String getMacroDefinitions()
        Get the macro definitions
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the macro definitions; an empty object if no macro definition exists

      • getMessageIDAndNames

        private java.lang.String getMessageIDAndNames()
        Get the message ID owners, names, and values
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the message ID owners, names, and values; an empty string if no message IDs or names exist
